name: Jumpy Bird - Night Mode Tiny Bird Fly Adventure
name_original: Jumpy Bird - Night Mode Tiny Bird Fly Adventure
description:
Jumpy Bird is fun and addicting and simple touch game.
Flap your wings to fly and travel as much as you can.
- Tap to flap your wings to fly.
- Avoid pipes.
 - Try to get 4 medals: Bronze, Silver, Gold (hard), Platinum (very hard).

Play this simple, fun and addictive game.
